definition[0]: an unpleasant soft substance, especially food, which is partly liquid and partly solid
example[0]: The boiled vegetables had turned to mush.
example[1]: She trudged through the mush of fallen leaves.
definition[1]: a thick porridge made from cornmeal
definition[2]: a book, film etc that is about love and is sentimental
definition[3]: used to speak to someone in an angry way
example[3]: Oi, mush! Get your hands off my car!
example[4]: I didn’t want to see his ugly mush ever again.
definition[5]: used to tell a team of dogs that pull a sledge over snow to start moving
